Key Match Events: Denzel Dumfries headed a late equaliser for the Netherlands to rescue a point in a 1-1 draw with Hungary
Virgil van Dijk was sent off for two yellow cards in the space of three minutes
Pre-Game Insights: Hungary had been hoping for a first win over the Netherlands in 40 years
Post-Match Reflections: Denzel Dumfries praised the players for their fight and described the 1-1 draw as fair
Virgil van Dijk said he gave the referee a reason to give a yellow card for his second booking
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Netherlands had over 80% possession in the first half
Hungary had been hoping to end a run of nine straight defeats against the Dutch
Others: The game was played at Puskás Aréna in Budapest, Hungary, with an attendance of 55,300
